2025-06-26.content: Addressed multiple Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures (CVEs) by updating dependencies.

summary.title: Dependencies Updated for Security
summary.summary: Updated dependencies to address multiple Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures (CVEs).

2025-06-26.content: Fixed an issue with the nomos CLI which prevented setting up autocomplete by using the `nomos completion` command. For more information see [Use the nomos command-line tool](https://cloud.google.com/kubernetes-engine/enterprise/config-sync/docs/how-to/nomos-command).

summary.title: Fixed nomos CLI autocomplete setup
summary.summary: This release fixes an issue where the nomos CLI autocomplete setup was failing. Users can now successfully set up autocomplete using the `nomos completion` command.

2025-06-26.content: Fixed an issue which prevented a resource conflict metric from being recorded in rare cases.

summary.title: Resource conflict metric recording issue fixed
summary.summary: The resource conflict metric will now be recorded correctly in all cases, resolving a rare issue.

2025-05-29.content: Addressed multiple Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures (CVEs) by updating dependencies.

summary.title: Dependency Updates for Security
summary.summary: Updated dependencies to address multiple Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures (CVEs).
